TITLE: Blink
Lv0: Activate a fate stacked into one of your fatelines as if it were seeded into its own fateline.
Lv1: That card remains stacked in that fateline.
CRYSTALLIZED: Change the seed of 1 of your stacked fatelines to a different card in that fateline.

TITLE: Explosion
Lv0: Assign 2 damage to a single target character.
Lv1: Assign 1 damage to a single target character adjacent to the first target.
Lv2: Assign 1 damage to another target character.
CRYSTALLIZED: Assign 1 damage to a single target character. Assign 1 damage to adjacent characters.

TITLE: Link
Lv0: Your next damage assignment or reinforcement this turn also applies to 1 other target character.
CRYSTALLIZED: Your next damage assignment, reinforcement or heal this turn also applies to 1 other target character.

TITLE: Shadow
Lv1: That character cannot be assigned damage this turn.
Lv2: Gain 1 crystal charge with no channel time.
CRYSTALLIZED: Suppress a target character. That character cannot be assigned damage this turn.

TITLE: Transfer
Lv0: Reassign 2 damage from target allied character to another target character.
Lv1: Reassign 2 reinforcement from target allied character to another target character.
Lv2: Target opponent loses 1 crystal charge. You gain 1 crystal charge.
CRYSTALLIZED: Target opponent loses 1 crystal charge. You gain 1 crystal charge.
